ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla

Class CoverBitmap

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.CoverBitmap

  • public final class CoverBitmap
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing utility functions to create Bitmaps display song info and album art.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int STYLE_INFO_BELOW
      Draw cover on top or left with song info on bottom or right (depending on orientation).
      static int STYLE_NO_INFO
      Draw no song info, only the cover.
      static int STYLE_OVERLAPPING_BOX
      Draw cover in background and a box with song info on top.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoverBitmap()

      Create an image representing the given song.
      static android.graphics.Bitmap generateDefaultCover(android.content.Context context, int width, int height)
      Generate the default cover (a rendition of a CD).
      static android.graphics.Bitmap generatePlaceholderCover(android.content.Context context, int width, int height, java.lang.String title)
      Draws a placeholder cover from given title string

    • Method Detail

      • createBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap createBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                                                   int style,
                                                   android.graphics.Bitmap coverArt,
                                                   Song song,
                                                   int width,
                                                   int height)
        Create an image representing the given song. Includes cover art and possibly song title/artist/ablum, depending on the given style.
        Parameters:
        context - A context to use.
        style - One of CoverBitmap.STYLE_*
        coverArt - The cover art for the song.
        song - Title and other data are taken from here for info modes.
        width - Maximum width of image
        height - Maximum height of image
        Returns:
        The image, or null if the song was null, or width or height were less than 1

      • generateDefaultCover

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap generateDefaultCover(android.content.Context context,
                                                           int width,
                                                           int height)
        Generate the default cover (a rendition of a CD). Returns a square iamge. Both dimensions are the lesser of width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - The max width
        height - The max height
        Returns:
        The default cover.

      • generatePlaceholderCover

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap generatePlaceholderCover(android.content.Context context,
                                                               int width,
                                                               int height,
                                                               java.lang.String title)
        Draws a placeholder cover from given title string
        Parameters:
        title - A text string to use in the cover
        Returns:
        bitmap The drawn bitmap
